import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Header.css'; import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; import { useStateValue } from './StateProvider'; import ShoppingBasketIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ShoppingBasket'; function Header() { const [{ basket }] = useStateValue(); let items = basket.reduce((a, b) => parseInt(a, 10) + parseInt(b.quantity, 10), 0); return (
